argumentText:
ARGUMENT
q

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmapat.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pmapat.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_atbase | |- ( P e. A -> P e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` K ) = ( le ` K ) |
| 6 | 3, 5, 1, 2 | #P_pmapval | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( M ` P ) = { q e. A | q ( le ` K ) P } ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> ( M ` P ) = { q e. A | q ( le ` K ) P } ) |
| 8 |  | #P_hlatl | |- ( K e. HL -> K e. AtLat ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ad2antrr | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) /\ q e. A ) -> K e. AtLat ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) /\ q e. A ) -> q e. A ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) /\ q e. A ) -> P e. A ) |
| 12 | 5, 1 | #P_atcmp | |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ q e. A /\ P e. A ) -> ( q ( le ` K ) P <-> q = P ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 10, 11, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) /\ q e. A ) -> ( q ( le ` K ) P <-> q = P ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_rabbidva | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> { q e. A | q ( le ` K ) P } = { q e. A | q = P } ) |
| 15 |  | #P_rabsn | |- ( P e. A -> { q e. A | q = P } = { P } ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> { q e. A | q = P } = { P } ) |
| 17 | 7, 14, 16 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> ( M ` P ) = { P } ) |
